title: Percentage of U.S. population engaged in leisure and sports per day 2010 to 2018
summary: This is a multi-line chart with 3 lines representing All, Men, and Women. The y axis denotes Engagement in leisure and sports and the x axis denotes Year.
Overall All, Men, and Women are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Engagement in leisure and sports in descending order is: 1. Men, 2. All, and lastly, 3. Women.
Throughout the period, Men generally had the highest Engagement in leisure and sports relative to others with an average of 96.04, and it reached its maximum at 2012 with a value of 96.9.
Followed by All which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 95.7 Engagement in leisure and sports,reaching its highest point  at 2012 with a value of 96.2.
Women mostly had the least Engagement in leisure and sports with a mean value of 95.37, which peaked at 2014 with a value of 95.7.
